channel.title: Making Boxes bigger - Need Help!
channel.description:
Ok, i need help with making boxes on interfaces bigger, and i interfaces i mean are like the friends list,ignore, the Male and female Tab boxes on the Character design interface, and in the attack interface also. what im asing for is how can i change it to make the boxes a litte bigger like 2cm bigger or so. i am certain this is possible as i seen many people do this, but i need to know how to.
-Thanks for helping & the People who understand -

item.title: Making Boxes bigger - Need Help!
item.dc:creator: @burnt_w_pwnt burnt w pwnt
item.description:
@burnt_w_pwnt wrote:

ok…
well i recently added the attack interface and the boxes are to small…
and ive seen ppl who had my problem and they just made their boxes bigger… i can even print sreen or vid it of my mate and show you if u like
anways i have the box sprites but it doesnt read off it, in class9 how am i supposed to make it read from it or make every box that i was talking about bigger?

Read full topic

item.title: Making Boxes bigger - Need Help!

item.description:

what im asing for is how can i change it to make the boxes a litte bigger like 2cm bigger or so.
i am certain this is possible as i seen many people do this, but i need to know how to.

-Thanks for helping & the People who understand -[/quote]
The reason they have been able to do this is through making a whole new interface. Not editing an old one.
